q1.question: A NEW cough, runny nose, sore throat, fever, shaking chills, muscle aches or recent diarrhea?

q2.question: A NEW cough, or cough now producing sputum/mucus, new wheezing or new shortness of breath?

q3.question: NEW shortness of breath at rest, on exertion or when lying flat, new shortness of breath that awakens you from sleep or new swelling in your feet or legs?
options: Shortness of breath when lying flat
New Shortness of breath that awakens you from sleep
New swelling in your feet or legs

q4.question: NEW generalized weakness, lightheadedness or dizziness?
